mapper.sql: showbusi_id, shop_id, showarea_id, show_page_no, showsite_id, show_line_axis, show_row_axis, showsite_width, showsite_high, showsite_unit_id, showsite_unit_type, showsite_unit_url, showsite_pic_id, showsite_pic_width, showsite_pic_high, showsite_ad_text, showsite_eff_date, showsite_exp_date, showsite_valid, showsite_combine, click_do, showsite_show_type, is_default, show_id
mapper.select: SELECT CASE a.showsite_unit_type WHEN 1 THEN '商品' WHEN 2 THEN '活动' WHEN 3 THEN '商店' WHEN 4 THEN '分类' END AS showsite_unit_type_name, b.shop_name, a.showbusi_id, a.showarea_id, a.show_page_no, a.showsite_id, a.show_line_axis, a.show_row_axis, a.showsite_width, a.showsite_high, a.showsite_unit_id, a.showsite_unit_url, a.showsite_pic_id, a.showsite_pic_width, a.showsite_pic_high, a.showsite_ad_text, a.showsite_eff_date, a.showsite_exp_date, a.showsite_valid, a.showsite_combine, a.click_do, a.showsite_show_type, a.showsite_unit_type FROM ad_showbusi_acc a,gd_shop_info b WHERE a.shop_id = b.shop_id AND a.is_default='N' and a.showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from ad_showbusi_acc where showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_default = 'Y'
mapper.delete: delete from ad_showbusi_acc where showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ad_showbusi_acc (showbusi_id, shop_id, showarea_id, show_page_no, showsite_id, show_line_axis, show_row_axis, showsite_width, showsite_high, showsite_unit_id, showsite_unit_type, showsite_unit_url, showsite_pic_id, showsite_pic_width, showsite_pic_high, showsite_ad_text, showsite_eff_date, showsite_exp_date, showsite_valid, showsite_combine, click_do, showsite_show_type, is_default,show_id) values (#{showbusiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showPageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showsiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showLineAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showRowAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showsiteWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showsiteHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showsiteUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{showsiteUnitType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showsiteUnitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showsitePicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{showsitePicWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showsitePicHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{showsiteAdText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{showsiteValid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showsiteCombine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickDo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showsiteShowType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update ad_showbusi_acc
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
show_page_no = #{showPageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
show_line_axis = #{showLineAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
show_row_axis = #{showRowAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
showsite_width = #{showsiteWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
showsite_high = #{showsiteHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
showsite_unit_id = #{showsiteUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
showsite_unit_type = #{showsiteUnitType,jdbcType=CHAR},
showsite_unit_url = #{showsiteUnitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
showsite_pic_id = #{showsitePicId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
showsite_pic_width = #{showsitePicWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
showsite_pic_high = #{showsitePicHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
showsite_ad_text = #{showsiteAdText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
showsite_eff_date = #{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
showsite_exp_date = #{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
showsite_valid = #{showsiteValid,jdbcType=CHAR},
showsite_combine = #{showsiteCombine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
click_do = #{clickDo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
showsite_show_type = #{showsiteShowType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
show_id = #{showId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where showbusi_id = #{showbusiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ad_showbusi_acc set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, show_page_no = #{showPageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, show_line_axis = #{showLineAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, show_row_axis = #{showRowAxis,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, showsite_width = #{showsiteWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, showsite_high = #{showsiteHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, showsite_unit_id = #{showsiteUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, showsite_unit_type = #{showsiteUnitType,jdbcType=CHAR}, showsite_unit_url = #{showsiteUnitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showsite_pic_id = #{showsitePicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, showsite_pic_width = #{showsitePicWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, showsite_pic_high = #{showsitePicHigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, showsite_ad_text = #{showsiteAdText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showsite_eff_date = #{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, showsite_exp_date = #{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, showsite_valid = #{showsiteValid,jdbcType=CHAR}, showsite_combine = #{showsiteCombine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_do = #{clickDo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, showsite_show_type = #{showsiteShowType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, show_id = #{showId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where showbusi_id = #{showbusiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_showbusi_acc WHERE showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND showsite_id = #{showsiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND show_page_no = #{showPageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_default = 'N' AND ((DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')>showsite_eff_date AND DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <showsite_exp_date) OR (DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') BETWEEN showsite_eff_date AND showsite_exp_date) OR (DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') BETWEEN showsite_eff_date AND showsite_exp_date) OR ((showsite_eff_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') ) AND (showsite_exp_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteEffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{showsiteExpDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') )))

SELECT show_page_no FROM ad_showbusi_acc WHERE showarea_id = #{showareaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND show_id = #{showId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND NOW() BETWEEN showsite_eff_date AND showsite_exp_date GROUP BY show_id,shop_id,show_page_no,showarea_id
